name: JPY Coin
public_notice:
JPY Coin (JPYC) was recently migrated : Polygon - from old contract to new contract; Shiden - from old contract to new contract ; Astar - from old contract to new contract.
This is JPY Coin (JPYC) v2. Visit this post for more information.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
